requirementText:
The Domain Model Generator takes as input all model requirements of the DDD model and generates the `DomainModelFiles` by using a LLM. It does this by assembling a system prompt that is made up from a preamble, the general prompt, the format of how to specify files and general requirements the generated DDD model must follow. The user prompt consists of the `ModelRequirement`s.
Use the `MessageParser` service.
Load resource files directly from the file system.
Use the following existing resource files to load the static prompt texts:
resources/prompts/general.txt : General statements usable in all generators
resources/prompts/model_preamble.txt : Preamble for the system prompt for generating the domain model
resources/prompts/model_requirements.txt : General requirements for generating the model
